scripts.setup: npm init && npm i -D @babel/core @babel/preset-env babel-jest jest && npm init @eslint/config@latest && npm i --save-dev --save-exact prettier && node --eval "fs.writeFileSync("babel.config.js", "module.exports = {presets: [['@babel/preset-env', {targets: {node: 'current'}}]],};")" && npm run fix
